basics.name: Gwyneth Raquepo
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in the Spring of 2023. I am interested in pursuing a career in Web Development or Computer Hardware Engineering.

courses: EE 361 | EE 361L: Digital Systems & Comp Design

activities.summary: The IEEE Student Branch Club promotes studentsâ€™ academic and professional success. We aim to encourage students to engage with the electrical and computer engineering community at the University of Hawaii at Manoa.
The Student Advisory Board acts as a bridge to communicate the student's concerns and suggestions to our faculty and industry partners.
